Articles.Content:
**KSP:** 1.1.3 Linux 64bit

**Problem:** Distance calculation wrong on vessel recovery

When recovering a vessel, distance is calculated to Cape Canaveral (?) instead of my default Launch Site (Kourou).

**Mods installed:**

KSCSwitcher v1.0.5956.23563

RealSolarSystem v0.11.4.0 (for launch sites)

RealismOverhaul v0.11.2 (for <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>)

**Reproduction steps:**

1. Switch Launch Site to Kourou
2. Restart KSP
3. Launch a vessel
4. Land near <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> (but outside <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> biome)
5. Recover the vessel

KSCSwitcher and Renamer have moved to the <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> group. Tank Lock has moved to LinuxGuruGamer. ThermalHelper is defunct.

Thank you.
Thread has been locked, per <abbr title="Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it.">OP</abbr>'s request.
